Fetch the orders of a backtest for the project Id, backtest Id and steps provided. The /backtests/orders/read API accepts requests in the following format:

ReadBacktestOrdersRequest Model - Request to read orders from a backtest.
start integer
required
example: 0
Starting index of the orders to be fetched. Required if end > 100.
end integer
required
example: 100
Last index of the orders to be fetched. Note that end - start must be less than 100.
projectId integer
required
example: 23456789
Id of the project from which to read the backtest.
backtestId string
required
example: 26c7bb06b8487cff1c7b3c44652b30f1
Id of the backtest from which to read the orders.
Example 
{
  "start": 0,
  "end": 100,
  "projectId": 23456789,
  "backtestId": "26c7bb06b8487cff1c7b3c44652b30f1"
}
